body.name: Hamilton Beach Easy Reach 4-Slice Countertop Toaster Oven With Roll-Top Door, 1200 Watts, Fits 9” Pizza, 3 Cooking Functions for Bake, Broil and Toast, Silver (31344DA)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 12 mins
features: EASY ACCESS TO FOOD AND COUNTERTOP: Easily access food in the toaster oven broiler and on your countertop with the Easy Reach roll-top door.
FITS 4 SLICES OF TOAST OR A 9" PIZZA: This Hamilton Beach toaster oven has room for cooking everything from snacks to side dishes.

COOK YOUR WAY WITH 3 COOKING FUNCTIONS: This toaster oven gives you the versatility to bake, broil and toast. It has temperature options ranging from 200-450° F — great for everyday tasks like heating leftovers, broiling chicken breasts and making toast.

SIMPLE MANUAL CONTROLS: This toaster oven has manual controls that are simple to use. Great for anyone who wants a toaster oven that gets the job done without being complicated. Includes 30 minute timer with Stay On function, ready bell and auto shutoff.
EASY TO KEEP CLEAN WHILE COOKING: The door stays up and out of the way of messy spills and drips when opened. The roll-top door and slide-out crumb tray are both removable for cleaning.
body.description: You won’t find a design Like the Hamilton Beach easy reach toaster oven with roll-top door anywhere else. Its unique and large opening makes food easy to reach. And since the door opens above the oven, It frees up your countertop space in front. Best of all, it’s easy to keep clean Because food can’t spill on the door. Contoured dials are easy to grip and turn, making it simple to switch between bake, broil and toast settings. The stay-on setting is safer thanks to a stop mechanism that prevents the knob from being turned to stay-on by accident.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Countertop convenience for breakfast, lunch or dinner This toaster oven is the ideal size for everything from snacks to side dishes and fits 4 slices of toast or a 9" pizza.

Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research and rigorous testing to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind. Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Easy Reach With Roll-Top Door Toaster Oven The Hamilton Beach Easy Reach Toaster Oven has a door that rolls up and stays out of the way to give you easy access to the oven without blocking your countertop. Because it stays up and out the way of drips and spills, the door doesn't get as messy as traditional toaster oven doors. The door is also removable for easy cleaning. It gives you the versatility to cook 3 ways — bake, broil or toast. Temperature options range from 200-450° F for cooking a variety of foods. It's great for everything from heating up leftovers to broiling chicken breasts and making toast. Simple manual controls that are straightforward and simple to use 30 minute timer with Stay On function, a ready bell that rings when the cooking cycle is complete and auto shutoff Features 2 rack positions and includes a baking pan, oven rack and a slide-out crumb tray for cleaning

Easy Access to Food and Countertop Easily access food in the oven and on your countertop with the Easy Reach roll-top door. Fits 4 Slices of Toast or a 9" Pizza The toaster oven has room for cooking everything from snacks to side dishes. Cook Your Way with 3 Cooking Functions This toaster oven gives you the versatility to bake, broil and toast. It has temperature options ranging from 200-450° F and is great for everyday tasks like heating up leftovers, broiling chicken breasts and making toast.

Simple Manual Controls The toaster oven has manual controls that are straightforward and simple to use. It's great for seniors or anyone who wants a toaster oven that efficiently gets the job done without being complicated. Includes a 30 minute timer with Stay On function, ready bell and auto shutoff. Easy to Keep Clean While Cooking The door stays up and out of the way of messy spills and drips when opened. The roll-top door and slide-out crumb tray are both removable for cleaning. Includes Bake Pan, Oven Rack & Crumb Tray The toaster oven has 2 rack positions and comes with a bake pan for toasting and baking, an oven rack for broiling and a slide-out crumb tray. When broiling foods on the oven rack, the bake pan rests on the supports below to catch drippings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Door out of the way when opened.
reviews.reviewText: Like my first one so much that I bought another when my old one gave out and at this price buying two in 6 years is still cheaper than an expensive One. Even toasting, a couple spuds cook evenly etc. The door raises up all the way up and out of the way of the tray (and your wrist) so it's very easy to take hot tray out of oven. The door is held on with only one Phillips screw at each(not rickety) end so if you somehow get something burnt onto the door glass you can simply remove the door and soak in a tub of dish of soapy water and reinstall. Easy controls, true heat and timer, and very even heating and browning of things like four Texas toast sized garlic cheese slices., Not one over browned spot on the garlic bread. Smaller than my bread box which is a plus for me. I have a professional ( largest one can buy) oven, a large air fryer with rotisserie so I actually bought this to be my "toaster" oven lol. Performed well :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: WOW! What a joy to have a roll top door! Simple idea & it works SO MUCH better. It doesn't take of counter top space & a plate can be put directly in front of the opening - because it opens like a garage door. It heats well, & toasts perfectly, even bagels. This is a great toaster ovens. Thanks Hamilton Beach! !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to clean. It takes a while to toast things. I like the clear window so one can monitor the degree of toasting. Has a small footprint, which is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little toaster oven does a great job toasting evenly. It heats up fast for the oven mode and bakes evenly also. It saves space on my countertop with the rounded shape. The door rolling up is a fantastic feature instead of a door that flaps open, taking up more space. Very easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good toaster, great design, easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This does a good job on toast, rolls, bagels, cheese toast, reheating leftovers and more. It looks nice on the counter and takes up less space than our old one. The curved door conveniently slides up out of the way. The door is designed to easily remove for cleaning. (You do NOT need to unscrew it as one reviewer said) The nonstick tray and slide out oven liner wipe off easily as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s just what the Dr. ordered!
reviews.reviewText: We love it! Simple toaster oven with the basic controls! Does just what we wanted and does it well. Excellent price and good quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful upgrade from my previous toaster oven
reviews.reviewText: After my toaster over with the slots on top and oven on the side started to malfunction, had a hard time finding a replacement as it was discontinued. My main purpose for it is to toast bread, waffles andheating up bagels (makes is easier to slice and then I toast them).After much research, decided on this model as it was the smallest size for my counter space and reviews looked pretty good; they did not disappoint!The Pros so far from my experience:* Rounded front door helps it take up a little less space than the traditional rectangle version, even visually less space.* Easier access to place/remove food from toaster oven with a wide opening when door is open.* Plenty of room for 4 breads/bagels. I only used for two at a time as in the photo.* Bake Pan, Oven Rack & Crumb Tray included.* Great option for when you don't want to use the conventional oven for cooking! (will update when I test this portion).* The Door Is Removable For Easy Cleaning. [Directions: Open the door, in the open position lift up to remove door for cleaning. reverse process to insert door back into toaster oven.]Con:* The instructions is off when it comes to temperature for toasting bread. Adjust according to your liking. The temperature used in this photo is 300 degrees; not the toast icon all the way in the end by 450 degrees (will be burnt toast). For bagels, I turn the knob down between 250 - about 275 degrees. That is all I can think of for con. Precautions:* Be Gentle With The Timer Knob: If you turn it on by mistake without plugging in first (as I already did, lol), wait for the timer to ding for finish. Then plug it in and restart the timer.Not worth risking breaking the mechanism trying to speed up to reset the timer knob.* Disconnect plug from outlet when not in use.* When finished toasting, wait a few seconds after opening the door (oven heats pretty good) to let the heat out and then remove the food.Happy with the purchase! Wonderful upgrade!
Excelente producto, diseño original y práctico.

reviews.reviewTitle: It worked for 4 minutes and then blew up!!
reviews.reviewText: I did not use the item until recently as I had purchased for use with Polymer Clay projects that I do sporadically during the year. Plug it in and it wen SNAP, CRACKLE and POP and then it was dead.Waste of money - so sad.

First off the product does not have Australian standard plugs, even though is it shipped from within Australia, meaning we had to find and use an adaptor for it. If I knew this or if it was written somewhere in the item description I wouldn’t have bought it.While the product worked it was great! Awesome for one person meals so I didn’t have to use the huge oven, however after only 5-6 uses within 2 weeks the heating elements stopped working all together. The timer would work and be turned on however nothing would happen with the heating elements so I have returned it to Amazon.Pretty damn unimpressed a Christmas present lasted not even a month with minimal use for the price I paid.

We were looking for a basic toaster oven that toasted well and basic bake. This is the best oven we’ve owned so far for toasting, tuna melts etc. Also good for basic baking. Pizza, baked potatoes turn out great. Easy reach feature is handy and door comes off for easy cleaning. Happy with our purchase so far.

reviews.reviewTitle: do not buy if in Australia
reviews.reviewText: Despite seller sending from Australia, comes with an American plug and 120 volts.Not safe for use and not able to use in Australia.I was really excited to use this oven and it looks great but for obvious reasons it can't be done!Package also arrived damaged with parts of the grill hanging out the outisde (bottom) of the box, which was a bit concerning.
